title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list do not appear in the File menu.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be persisted between sessions.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the software. 
2. Open multiple files. 
3. Close the software. 
4. Open the software again and check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened files are displayed in the list.
